scriptedEmail.name: User Account Locked
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email when a user's account becomes locked
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body">Your account has been locked on {site_link} due to too many failed login attempts. If you didn't try to login, contact the site administrator.</resource> <resource name="Subject">Account locked: {site_name}</resource> <resource name="Header">Account locked: {site_name}</resource> </language>
